title: Drawing, "Ovoidal frame for a picture"
medium: Pen and gray ink, brush and gray wash
markings: Verso: Cooper Union Museum for the Arts of Decoration (Lugt#457d)
provenance: Ex collection: Piancastelli and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Vertical rectangle. Below are two crossed flower sprays, on top is a rose garland forming a slope, on top. The surrounding wall is shown.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Ovoidal frame for a picture".
Pen and gray ink, brush and gray wash. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-5360.
